name: Offsite Postgres Backup
description: Schedule automatic offsite backup of app's Postgres database

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku API key. Get this by installing the Heroku CLI tool, log in from the command line and run 'heroku auth:token'

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: AWS Access Key ID of the IAM user with permission to PutObject in designated S3 bucket

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: AWS Secret Access Key (matches with AWS Access Key ID)

S3_BUCKET_PATH.description: Setting the S3 bucket path here will use this path as a default for all backups.  This setting can be overridden on the command line when performing a backup.  Include just the bucket name here, no leading or trailing slashes.
